text: Do you have a short written plan for what to do if a cyber incident happens, including who to contact and first steps?
hint: A one page checklist is enough to start.

text: Do you have a simple joiner and leaver checklist to grant and remove access to systems and shared folders?
hint: Checklists help make sure nothing is missed when people join or leave.

text: Do you keep a simple list of company devices and who is using them?
hint: A basic inventory helps you secure and recover devices.

text: Are administrator accounts reviewed monthly to make sure only the right people still have that level of access?
hint: Regular reviews catch leftover powerful access.

text: Are shared cloud folders set so that only named people or groups can view or edit them?
hint: Open links can spread further than intended.

text: Do you have a monthly reminder to check that devices and key applications are up to date?
hint: A simple calendar reminder helps keep everything current.

text: Is there a short note that explains who is responsible for backups and how to restore them?
hint: Clear ownership reduces confusion during recovery.

text: Do new starters receive a short digital safety briefing during their first week?
hint: Early awareness builds good habits from day one.
